20110113230109.000|20110113230111.000|TR0|chronology.

20110113230114.000|20110113230116.000|TR0|From the start, Loughner sparked concern 
20110113230116.000|20110113230118.000|TR0|among classmates and teachers.  Last 
20110113230118.000|20110113230121.000|TR0|February, a dean called campus police to 
20110113230121.000|20110113230123.000|TR0|report Loughner's suspicious behavior in 
20110113230123.000|20110113230125.000|TR0|class.  He is said to have reacted 
20110113230125.000|20110113230128.000|TR0|strangely, reacted strangely, a direct 
20110113230128.000|20110113230130.000|TR0|quote, to the reading of another student's 
20110113230130.000|20110113230132.000|TR0|poem.
20110113230132.000|20110113230135.000|TR0|
20110113230135.000|20110113230137.000|TR0|The dean described Loughner as -- quote -- 
20110113230137.000|20110113230139.000|TR0|"creepy, with a dark personality," also a 
20110113230139.000|20110113230142.000|TR0|direct quote.  Police suggested the school 
20110113230142.000|20110113230144.000|TR0|-- quote -- "keep an eye on him."  There 
20110113230144.000|20110113230146.000|TR0|were repeated run-ins.  In June, a teacher 
20110113230146.000|20110113230149.000|TR0|complained Loughner was disruptive.  
20110113230149.000|20110113230151.000|TR0|Police found that the instructor and the

20110113230851.000|20110113230853.000|TR0|example, she doesn't have another gunshot 
20110113230853.000|20110113230855.000|TR0|wound, right?
20110113230855.000|20110113230858.000|TR0|
20110113230858.000|20110113230900.000|TR0|FRIESE:  Well, that is part of the trauma 
20110113230900.000|20110113230902.000|TR0|workup, that is part of the trauma 
20110113230902.000|20110113230905.000|TR0|evaluation, is that you never assume that 
20110113230905.000|20110113230907.000|TR0|just what you see is all that is present.

20110113230912.000|20110113230914.000|TR0|some blood loss.  Her eyes were closed.

20110113230916.000|20110113230919.000|TR0|swollen right eye.  And she was grunting a

20110113230921.000|20110113230923.000|TR0|trying to communicate, but was being

20110113231044.000|20110113231047.000|TR0|help keep her alive.

20110113231049.000|20110113231051.000|TR0|(APPLAUSE)
20110113231051.000|20110113231054.000|TR0|
20110113231054.000|20110113231056.000|TR0|(END VIDEO CLIP)
20110113231056.000|20110113231058.000|TR0|
20110113231058.000|20110113231101.000|TR0|BLITZER:  Let's hear directly now from 
20110113231101.000|20110113231103.000|TR0|that extraordinary young man, Daniel 
20110113231103.000|20110113231105.000|TR0|Hernandez, who is joining us from Tucson.
20110113231105.000|20110113231108.000|TR0|
20110113231108.000|20110113231110.000|TR0|When the president of the United States 
20110113231110.000|20110113231112.000|TR0|calls you a hero, Daniel, what was going 
20110113231112.000|20110113231115.000|TR0|through your mind?
20110113231115.000|20110113231117.000|TR0|
20110113231117.000|20110113231119.000|TR0|DANIEL HERNANDEZ, GIFFORD'S INTERN:  I 
20110113231119.000|20110113231122.000|TR0|think I was just completely -- there is 
20110113231122.000|20110113231124.000|TR0|really no words to describe it, to be 100 
20110113231124.000|20110113231126.000|TR0|percent honest.
20110113231126.000|20110113231129.000|TR0|
20110113231129.000|20110113231131.000|TR0|It is very humbling to have anyone refer 
20110113231131.000|20110113231133.000|TR0|to you as a hero, especially when it is 
20110113231133.000|20110113231136.000|TR0|the president of the United States.  But 
20110113231136.000|20110113231138.000|TR0|I'm afraid I have to still disagree with 
20110113231138.000|20110113231140.000|TR0|the president of the United States.  I 
20110113231140.000|20110113231142.000|TR0|still don't think that I am a hero, 
20110113231142.000|20110113231145.000|TR0|because, like I have been saying for days, 
20110113231145.000|20110113231147.000|TR0|I think the real heroes are the people 
20110113231147.000|20110113231149.000|TR0|that are the public servants, the people 
20110113231149.000|20110113231152.000|TR0|that are the doctors, the congresswoman 
20110113231152.000|20110113231154.000|TR0|herself, her staff.
20110113231154.000|20110113231156.000|TR0|

20110113231159.000|20110113231201.000|TR0|their lives to public service, so I think 
20110113231201.000|20110113231203.000|TR0|they are the real heroes.
20110113231203.000|20110113231206.000|TR0|
20110113231206.000|20110113231208.000|TR0|BLITZER:  Daniel, for those viewers here 
20110113231208.000|20110113231210.000|TR0|in the United States and around the world 
20110113231210.000|20110113231213.000|TR0|who might not know, tell us what happened 
20110113231213.000|20110113231215.000|TR0|Saturday morning and what you did.
20110113231215.000|20110113231217.000|TR0|
20110113231217.000|20110113231220.000|TR0|HERNANDEZ:  On Saturday morning, I was 
20110113231220.000|20110113231222.000|TR0|helping at an event called Congress on 
20110113231222.000|20110113231224.000|TR0|Your Corner, where the congresswoman was 
20110113231224.000|20110113231227.000|TR0|having a chance to speak one-on-one with 
20110113231227.000|20110113231229.000|TR0|her constituents.
20110113231229.000|20110113231231.000|TR0|
20110113231231.000|20110113231234.000|TR0|I was at the end of the line helping check 
20110113231234.000|20110113231236.000|TR0|people in about 30 to 40 feet away when I 
20110113231236.000|20110113231238.000|TR0|heard shots were fired.  When I heard that 
20110113231238.000|20110113231240.000|TR0|the shots were fired, my first instinct 
20110113231240.000|20110113231243.000|TR0|was to go see how the congresswoman was 
20110113231243.000|20110113231245.000|TR0|doing, because I assumed if there was 
20110113231245.000|20110113231247.000|TR0|indeed a gunman, she would likely be a 
20110113231247.000|20110113231250.000|TR0|target because of her position.
20110113231250.000|20110113231252.000|TR0|
20110113231252.000|20110113231254.000|TR0|Once that did indeed happen, and I got to 
20110113231254.000|20110113231257.000|TR0|where the congresswoman was, there was a 
20110113231257.000|20110113231259.000|TR0|few people who had been hit.  I started 
20110113231259.000|20110113231301.000|TR0|checking for pulses, started checking to 
20110113231301.000|20110113231304.000|TR0|see who was still breathing.
20110113231304.000|20110113231306.000|TR0|
20110113231306.000|20110113231308.000|TR0|I got to two to three people, however, 
20110113231308.000|20110113231311.000|TR0|when I noticed that the congresswoman was 
20110113231311.000|20110113231313.000|TR0|the one who had been most severely 
20110113231313.000|20110113231315.000|TR0|injured.  Her brain -- her head injury was 
20110113231315.000|20110113231318.000|TR0|just traumatic.  So the first thing I did 
20110113231318.000|20110113231320.000|TR0|was pick her up off of the ground, because 
20110113231320.000|20110113231322.000|TR0|in the position she was in, she was a 
20110113231322.000|20110113231325.000|TR0|little bit vulnerable, because she was 
20110113231325.000|20110113231327.000|TR0|breathing in her own blood.
20110113231327.000|20110113231329.000|TR0|
20110113231329.000|20110113231332.000|TR0|And I wanted to make sure that I got her 
20110113231332.000|20110113231334.000|TR0|upright.  So, I propped her up against my 
20110113231334.000|20110113231336.000|TR0|chest to make sure that she was in an 
20110113231336.000|20110113231338.000|TR0|upright position, so that she could 
20110113231338.000|20110113231341.000|TR0|breathe.  Once I did that, I started 
20110113231341.000|20110113231343.000|TR0|applying pressure to her wound to try and 
20110113231343.000|20110113231345.000|TR0|stem some of the blood loss.
20110113231345.000|20110113231348.000|TR0|
20110113231348.000|20110113231350.000|TR0|BLITZER:  And you had some training as a 
20110113231350.000|20110113231352.000|TR0|first-responder, even though you are only

20110113231409.000|20110113231411.000|TR0|nursing assistant, as well as phlebotomy.  
20110113231411.000|20110113231413.000|TR0|So I just knew the very basics.  I never 
20110113231413.000|20110113231416.000|TR0|even took my certification test, because I 
20110113231416.000|20110113231418.000|TR0|was actually interning for her 
20110113231418.000|20110113231420.000|TR0|congressional campaign in 2008.
20110113231420.000|20110113231423.000|TR0|

20110113231434.000|20110113231436.000|TR0|HERNANDEZ:  I don't know if the gunman was 
20110113231436.000|20110113231439.000|TR0|still shooting, because my only concern at

20110113231511.000|20110113231514.000|TR0|in that situation, two seconds seems like

20110113231516.000|20110113231518.000|TR0|

20110113231945.000|20110113231947.000|TR0|Cafferty File" -- Jack.
20110113231947.000|20110113231950.000|TR0|
20110113231950.000|20110113231952.000|TR0|JACK CAFFERTY, CNN ANCHOR:  It was one of 
20110113231952.000|20110113231954.000|TR0|President Obama's finer moments, I 
20110113231954.000|20110113231957.000|TR0|believe, speaking to a full auditorium in 
20110113231957.000|20110113231959.000|TR0|Tucson and a wider television audience of 
20110113231959.000|20110113232001.000|TR0|a grieving nation.
20110113232001.000|20110113232004.000|TR0|
20110113232004.000|20110113232006.000|TR0|The president told Americans we can be 
20110113232006.000|20110113232008.000|TR0|better.  In light of the massacre of 
20110113232008.000|20110113232011.000|TR0|innocence and a country more divided than 
20110113232011.000|20110113232013.000|TR0|ever, Mr. Obama said it is time to talk to 
20110113232013.000|20110113232015.000|TR0|each other in a way that heals, not in a 
20110113232015.000|20110113232018.000|TR0|way that wounds.
20110113232018.000|20110113232020.000|TR0|
20110113232020.000|20110113232022.000|TR0|As he eulogized the dead, the president 
20110113232022.000|20110113232024.000|TR0|said, while we may not be able to stop all 
20110113232024.000|20110113232027.000|TR0|the evil in the world, how we treat each 
20110113232027.000|20110113232029.000|TR0|other is entirely up to us.  Mr. Obama 
20110113232029.000|20110113232031.000|TR0|spoke at length about Christina Green, the 
20110113232031.000|20110113232034.000|TR0|little nine-year-old girl who was killed.  
20110113232034.000|20110113232036.000|TR0|He said that he wants our democracy to be 
20110113232036.000|20110113232038.000|TR0|as good as she imagined it.
20110113232038.000|20110113232041.000|TR0|
20110113232041.000|20110113232043.000|TR0|The president walked a fine line as he 
20110113232043.000|20110113232045.000|TR0|tried to stay above the partisan blame 
20110113232045.000|20110113232048.000|TR0|game that has evolved since this tragedy.  
20110113232048.000|20110113232050.000|TR0|He said -- quoting here -- "The forces 
20110113232050.000|20110113232052.000|TR0|that divide us are not as strong as the 
20110113232052.000|20110113232055.000|TR0|forces that unite us."
20110113232055.000|20110113232057.000|TR0|
20110113232057.000|20110113232059.000|TR0|Many think the speech was just what the 
20110113232059.000|20110113232102.000|TR0|doctor ordered for a country reeling from 
20110113232102.000|20110113232104.000|TR0|the shootings and weary of years of 
20110113232104.000|20110113232106.000|TR0|divisive politics.  But in the long run, 
20110113232106.000|20110113232109.000|TR0|how much will it really matter?
20110113232109.000|20110113232111.000|TR0|
20110113232111.000|20110113232113.000|TR0|There's still a very dark side to what 
20110113232113.000|20110113232116.000|TR0|happened in Tucson, a very dark side.

20110113232437.000|20110113232440.000|TR0|
20110113232440.000|20110113232442.000|TR0|Even if someone is flagged, it is a 
20110113232442.000|20110113232444.000|TR0|complicated process, according to forensic 
20110113232444.000|20110113232447.000|TR0|psychiatrist Lise Van Susteren.  It has to 
20110113232447.000|20110113232449.000|TR0|be proven by a psychiatrist that a person 
20110113232449.000|20110113232451.000|TR0|is a danger to himself or others or is 
20110113232451.000|20110113232454.000|TR0|almost completely nonfunctional, the first 
20110113232454.000|20110113232456.000|TR0|step in forcing treatment.  Then it has to

20110113232512.000|20110113232514.000|TR0|Indeed.  In our judicial system, in 
20110113232514.000|20110113232517.000|TR0|working with the mentally ill, it is 
20110113232517.000|20110113232519.000|TR0|looked upon as an adversarial situation.  
20110113232519.000|20110113232521.000|TR0|So you have a lawyer who is on one side

20110113235303.000|20110113235305.000|TR0|uniting in the U.S., violence will have

20110113235309.000|20110113235312.000|TR0|Joe in Florida writes: "No, this event 
20110113235312.000|20110113235314.000|TR0|will not have any effect on dampening the 
20110113235314.000|20110113235316.000|TR0|sharp exchanges between competing 
20110113235316.000|20110113235319.000|TR0|interests.  A ribald debate is what was 
20110113235319.000|20110113235321.000|TR0|anticipated and expected in a democracy.  
20110113235321.000|20110113235323.000|TR0|To expect less is to diminish American 
20110113235323.000|20110113235326.000|TR0|democracy."
20110113235326.000|20110113235328.000|TR0|
20110113235328.000|20110113235330.000|TR0|Karl in Michigan: "It will only happen if 
20110113235330.000|20110113235333.000|TR0|the parties involved take an active role 
20110113235333.000|20110113235335.000|TR0|in monitoring themselves and their 
20110113235335.000|20110113235337.000|TR0|members.  This includes the political 
20110113235337.000|20110113235340.000|TR0|parties and the media.  We can't keep 
20110113235340.000|20110113235342.000|TR0|going down the road we're on and not do 
20110113235342.000|20110113235344.000|TR0|permanent damage to our society."
20110113235344.000|20110113235347.000|TR0|
20110113235347.000|20110113235349.000|TR0|And Ken writes from North Carolina: "The 
20110113235349.000|20110113235351.000|TR0|odds of winning the lottery, about 1 in 
20110113235351.000|20110113235354.000|TR0|176 million.  The odds of politicians 
20110113235354.000|20110113235356.000|TR0|changing the tone of political debate in 
20110113235356.000|20110113235358.000|TR0|this country, less than that."
20110113235358.000|20110113235401.000|TR0|
20110113235401.000|20110113235403.000|TR0|If you want to read more, you'll find it 
20110113235403.000|20110113235405.000|TR0|on my blog: CNN.com/CaffertyFile -- Wolf.

20110113235531.000|20110113235533.000|TR0|JEANNE MOOS, CNN CORRESPONDENT 
20110113235533.000|20110113235536.000|TR0|(voice-over):  This is a tale of two 
20110113235536.000|20110113235538.000|TR0|critters.  One gives folks joy; the other 
20110113235538.000|20110113235540.000|TR0|gives them the creeps. Ever wonder what it 
20110113235540.000|20110113235543.000|TR0|would be like to wake up with a rat 
20110113235543.000|20110113235545.000|TR0|crawling on you?
20110113235545.000|20110113235547.000|TR0|
20110113235547.000|20110113235550.000|TR0|UNIDENTIFIED MALE:  (EXPLETIVE DELETED)
20110113235550.000|20110113235552.000|TR0|
20110113235552.000|20110113235554.000|TR0|MOOS:  Jeff Ford had fallen asleep riding 
20110113235554.000|20110113235557.000|TR0|the subway from Manhattan to Brooklyn at 2 
20110113235557.000|20110113235559.000|TR0|in the morning.
20110113235559.000|20110113235601.000|TR0|
20110113235601.000|20110113235603.000|TR0|JEFF FORD, SHOT VIDEO OF RAT ON SUBWAY:  A 
20110113235603.000|20110113235606.000|TR0|woman screams.  I looked up to see what's 
20110113235606.000|20110113235608.000|TR0|going on.  I see a rat running back and 
20110113235608.000|20110113235610.000|TR0|forth.
20110113235610.000|20110113235613.000|TR0|
20110113235613.000|20110113235615.000|TR0|MOOS:  He whipped out his camera and took 
20110113235615.000|20110113235617.000|TR0|these shots of the rat after it jumped 
20110113235617.000|20110113235620.000|TR0|onto a sleeping guy's lap, then took off.  
20110113235620.000|20110113235622.000|TR0|By the time Jeff adjusted the camera to 
20110113235622.000|20110113235624.000|TR0|shoot video, the rat was back.
20110113235624.000|20110113235627.000|TR0|
20110113235627.000|20110113235629.000|TR0|FORD:  He runs up the guy's leg.
20110113235629.000|20110113235631.000|TR0|
20110113235631.000|20110113235634.000|TR0|MOOS:  It's bad enough seeing rats on the 
20110113235634.000|20110113235636.000|TR0|track, but in your face?  Nobody bothered 
20110113235636.000|20110113235638.000|TR0|to rat out the rat to warn the sleeping 
20110113235638.000|20110113235641.000|TR0|guy. Amazingly, he remained fairly calm, 
20110113235641.000|20110113235643.000|TR0|so calm that...
20110113235643.000|20110113235645.000|TR0|
20110113235645.000|20110113235648.000|TR0|FORD:  He goes right back to sleep, like 
20110113235648.000|20110113235650.000|TR0|it didn't even happen.
20110113235650.000|20110113235652.000|TR0|
20110113235652.000|20110113235655.000|TR0|MOOS (on camera):  Maybe thought he was 
20110113235655.000|20110113235657.000|TR0|dreaming.
20110113235657.000|20110113235659.000|TR0|
20110113235659.000|20110113235701.000|TR0|But it's a rare and slow news day when you 
20110113235701.000|20110113235704.000|TR0|can cross a rat story with a tale of a 
20110113235704.000|20110113235706.000|TR0|cross-eyed opossum.
20110113235706.000|20110113235708.000|TR0|
20110113235708.000|20110113235711.000|TR0|(voice-over) Her name is Heidi.  She lives 
20110113235711.000|20110113235713.000|TR0|at Leipzig Zoo in Germany, and her crossed 
20110113235713.000|20110113235715.000|TR0|eyes have seduced possum lovers worldwide. 
20110113235715.000|20110113235718.000|TR0|She's got her own Facebook page, with 
20110113235718.000|20110113235720.000|TR0|thousands of friends added by the hour, 
20110113235720.000|20110113235722.000|TR0|making comments like, "What big eyes you 
20110113235722.000|20110113235725.000|TR0|have."
20110113235725.000|20110113235727.000|TR0|
